title: American Eagle Bet Big On Jean Genie Sydney Sweeney…And It Worked
description: Its ad campaigns not only whipped up controversy but have propelled American Eagle sales and growth, while it has confirmed Martha Stewart as its new holiday season face.
content:
Actress Sydney Sweeney proved a jean genie for AEO but Martha Stewrat will be the brand's holiday season face. Photographer: Michael Nagle/Bloomberg
